member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.AppIDProperty
member.summary: Application ID - provided by inneractive at the application registration

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.AdTypeProperty
member.summary: Ad type - can be banner only, text only, or interstitial ad

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.ReloadTimeProperty
member.summary: Reload time - the ad refresh time (in seconds) Not relevant for a interstitial ad

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.AgeProperty
member.summary: Age - User’s age

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.DistributionIDProperty
member.summary: Distribution Id - Distribution Channel ID (659 for banner ads, 788 for text ads)

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.ExternalIDProperty
member.summary: External Id - An application specific id – the id of the requesting device in the partner’s domain

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.GenderProperty
member.summary: Gender - User’s gender (allowed values: M, m, F, f, Male, Female)

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.GPSProperty
member.summary: Gps Coordinates - GPS ISO code location data in latitude, longitude format. For example: 53.542132,-2.239856 (w/o spaces)

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.KeywordsProperty
member.summary: Keywords - Keywords relevant to this user’s specific session (comma separated)

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.LocationProperty
member.summary: Location - Comma separated list of country, state/province, city. for example: US,NY,NY (w/o spaces)

member.name: F:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.MsisdnProperty
member.summary: Msisdn - User’s mobile number (MSISDN format, with international prefix)

member.name: M:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.DisplayAd(System.String,Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.IaAdType,System.Windows.Controls.Grid,System.Int32)
member.summary: DisplayAd function displays an ad
member.param: Application ID - provided by inneractive at the application registration
Ad type - can be banner only, text only, or interstitial ad
Root grid - the grid in which the ad will be displayed Not relevant for a interstitial ad
Reload time - the ad refresh time (in seconds) Not relevant for a interstitial ad
member.returns: Returns true if succeeded, or false if failed. Can fail in the following cases: - No network connection available - appId is null or an empty string - rootGrid is null and adType isn't interstitial

member.name: M:Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.DisplayAd(System.String,Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.IaAdType,System.Windows.Controls.Grid,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Inneractive.Nokia.Ad.InneractiveAd.IaOptionalParams,System.String})
member.summary: DisplayAd function displays an ad
member.param: Application ID - provided by inneractive at the application registration
Ad type - can be banner only, text only, or interstitial ad
Root grid - the grid in which the ad will be displayed Not relevant for a interstitial ad
Reload time - the ad refresh time (in seconds) Not relevant for a interstitial ad
Optional parameters for the ad request
member.returns: Returns true if succeeded, or false if failed. Can fail in the following cases: - No network connection available - appId is null or an empty string - rootGrid is null and adType isn't interstitial
